attributes.action: Defend the law that allowed the arrest of Damian Green
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned, noting that both the speaker's office and the opposition were told before the fact of the impending arrest of Damian Green, do hereby petition the Prime Minister to come to parliament as soon as possible to confirm the following assertions:

1) That his office was not informed of the intent to arrest Damian Green before the fact

2) That no government minister was informed of said intent

3) That no member of the government, or person under their authority consulted with the police over the legitimacy of said act

4) That said act was not an abuse of power, and as such no change need be made to the law

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
